vi, vt 1) o`zini ahmoqlarcha tutmoq; 2) ahmoq qilmoq, aldamoq, laqillatmoq

for: prep 1) uchun; ... deb; ~ my sake meni deb; ~ children bolalar uchun; it is very good ~ you bu siz uchun juda foydali; 2) tarafdori, uchun ma`nosida; we are ~ peace biz tinchlik tarafdori; 3) biror maqsadda yoki niyatda, uchun; just ~ fun qiziqchilik uch
